recipes.ingredients: 1 pound ground chicken, 1 pound chicken sausage, casings removed, 1/4 cup almond flour, 1 large egg, 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 2 cups low-sodium marinara sauce
recipes.directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). In a large bowl, combine ground chicken, chicken sausage, almond flour, egg, Parmesan cheese, parsley, minced garlic, dried oregano, onion powder, salt, and black pepper. Mix well until all ingredients are evenly distributed, Roll the mixture into 1-inch meatballs and arrange them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle the meatballs with olive oil, Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the internal temperature of the meatballs reaches 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), While the meatballs are baking, heat the marinara sauce in a large skillet over medium heat, Add the baked meatballs to the sauce and let them simmer for about 5-10 minutes, Serve the chicken sausage meatballs with additional parsley for garnish, if desired.

recipes.ingredients: 1 cup of strawberries, hulled, 1 cup of cantaloupe, cut into cubes or balls, 1 cup of honeydew melon, cut into cubes or balls, 1 cup of pineapple, cut into cubes, 1 cup of seedless grapes, 1 cup of blueberries, Wooden skewers
recipes.directions: Begin by preparing all the fruit - wash the strawberries, cantaloupe, honeydew, pineapple, and grapes. Make sure the blueberries are rinsed and free of any stems, Gently thread the fruit onto the wooden skewers, alternating types of fruit and colors for a varied and attractive presentation, Arrange the fruit kebabs on a platter and serve immediately or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. These kebabs are best enjoyed fresh but can be made a few hours in advance.

recipes.ingredients: 1 cup fresh strawberries, hulled, 1/2 cup blueberries, 1/2 medium banana, sliced, 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk, 1/2 cup ice cubes, 1 tablespoon chia seeds, optional, 1 tablespoon flaxseed meal, optional, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, Sugar substitute equivalent to 1 tablespoon sugar, optional
recipes.directions: Place strawberries, blueberries, banana, almond milk, ice cubes, chia seeds and flaxseed meal, if using, lemon juice, vanilla extract, and sugar substitute, if desired, into a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute or until desired consistency is reached. If the smoothie is too thick, you can add more almond milk to thin it out. Once done, pour the smoothie into glasses and serve immediately.

recipes.ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced into strips, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 medium red bell pepper, sliced, 1 medium green bell pepper, sliced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, sliced, 1 large onion, sliced, 8 small whole-wheat tortillas, 1/2 cup low-fat sour cream or Greek yogurt, optional, 1/2 cup salsa, Lime wedges, for serving, Fresh cilantro, chopped, for garnish, optional
recipes.directions: In a large bowl, combine chicken strips with olive oil, chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper. Toss well to coat. Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the seasoned chicken strips and cook for about 6 minutes or until fully cooked and browned. Remove chicken from the skillet and set aside. In the same skillet, add a bit more olive oil if necessary, and toss in the bell peppers and onion. Sauté until vegetables are tender and slightly charred, about 5-7 minutes. Return the chicken to the skillet and stir to combine with the vegetables. Warm the tortillas according to the package instructions. Serve the chicken and vegetables with warm tortillas, and offer sour cream or Greek yogurt, salsa, and lime wedges on the side. Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.

recipes.ingredients: 3 cups rolled oats, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/4 cup sugar-free maple syrup or honey, 1 cup unsweetened almond milk, 2 large eggs, 1/4 cup melted coconut oil or unsweetened applesauce, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts or pecans, 1 cup fresh blueberries or mixed berries
recipes.directions: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and grease a 9-inch square baking dish, In a large bowl, mix together the rolled oats, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt, and baking powder, In another bowl, whisk together the sugar-free maple syrup or honey, unsweetened almond milk, eggs, melted coconut oil or applesauce, and vanilla extract until well combined, Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and stir until just combined. Gently fold in the nuts and berries, Spread the mixture evenly in the prepared baking dish, Bake in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the top is golden and the oatmeal is set, Allow to cool slightly before serving. Can be enjoyed warm or at room temperature.

recipes.ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin or tenderloin, cut into 1-inch cubes, 1 large red bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 large yellow bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 large green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces, 1 large red onion, cut into 1-inch pieces, 8 cherry tomatoes, 8 small cremini mushrooms, cleaned, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon low-sodium soy sauce, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, Wooden or metal skewers
recipes.directions: If using wooden skewers, soak them in water for at least 30 minutes to prevent burning. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, soy sauce, oregano, garlic powder, and black pepper for the marinade. Place the beef cubes in a resealable plastic bag and pour half of the marinade over the beef. Seal and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, up to 2 hours, turning the bag occasionally, Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Thread the marinated beef cubes, bell peppers, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and mushrooms onto the skewers, alternating the ingredients. Brush the vegetables with the remaining marinade, Grill the kebabs on the preheated grill, turning occasionally, until the beef is cooked to desired doneness and vegetables are tender, about 8 to 10 minutes for medium-rare. Serve immediately.

recipes.ingredients: 1 pound flank steak, trimmed, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon smoked paprika, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, 2 bell peppers (any color), sliced, 1 large onion, sliced, Juice of 1 lime, 4 low-carb flour tortillas, warmed, Fresh cilantro, chopped (for garnish), Lime wedges (for serving), Salsa (for serving), Optional: sour cream, guacamole for toppings
recipes.directions: In a small bowl, mix chili powder, smoked paprika, ground cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, and salt. Rub the seasoning mix all over the flank steak. Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the seasoned flank steak to the skillet. Cook for about 5-7 minutes on each side for medium-rare, or until done to your liking. Remove the steak from skillet and let it rest for 5 minutes. While the steak is resting, add the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil to the skillet. Sauté the bell peppers and onion slices over medium heat until they are tender, about 5-8 minutes. Slice the rested steak against the grain into thin strips. Sprinkle lime juice over the sliced steak. Place some of the steak and sautéed bell peppers and onions onto each warmed low-carb flour tortilla. Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with lime wedges, salsa, and optional sour cream or guacamole if desired.

recipes.ingredients: 4 whole-wheat tortillas (8 inches), 1 cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained, 1/2 cup shredded reduced-fat cheese, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon chili powder, Nonstick cooking spray
recipes.directions: In a mixing bowl, mash the black beans slightly. Stir in shredded cheese, salsa, cilantro, cumin, garlic powder, and chili powder. Spread the mixture evenly onto half of each tortilla. Fold the tortillas in half over the bean mixture to create a half-moon shape. Press gently to seal, Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat and lightly coat with cooking spray. Place a filled tortilla in the skillet and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side or until the outside is golden brown and the cheese has melted. Repeat with the remaining quesadillas. Slice each quesadilla into wedges and serve hot.

recipes.ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 
        1/2 cup almond flour, 
        1/2 cup sliced almonds, 
        1 teaspoon paprika, 
        1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 
        1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 
        1/4 teaspoon black pepper, 
        1/4 teaspoon salt, 
        2 egg whites, 
        2 tablespoons olive oil
recipes.directions:
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In a shallow dish, combine almond flour, sliced almonds, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, and salt. In another shallow dish, lightly beat the egg whites, 
        Dip each chicken breast into the egg whites, then into the almond mixture, pressing the mixture onto the chicken to get a good coating, 
        Heat the olive oil in a large, oven-proof skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden, 
        Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear. Ensure the internal temperature reaches 165 degrees F (74 degrees C) when checked with a meat thermometer, 
        Remove from the oven and let rest for a few minutes before serving. Serve hot.

recipes.ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 1 1/2 pounds),
        1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper,
        1 tablespoon olive oil,
        1/4 cup balsamic vinegar,
        1/2 cup low-sodium chicken broth,
        2 cloves garlic, minced,
        1 teaspoon dried oregano,
        1 teaspoon dried basil,
        1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese,
        1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley
recipes.directions:
Season the chicken breasts with the ground black pepper. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides, about 5-6 minutes per side.
        Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside, keeping it warm. In the same skillet, add balsamic vinegar, chicken broth, garlic, oregano, and basil. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 5 minutes, until the sauce thickens slightly.
        Return the chicken to the skillet, spooning the sauce over the breasts. Cover and simmer for an additional 7-10 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
        Sprinkle the feta cheese over the chicken, cover the skillet for a minute to allow the cheese to soften slightly. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
